articles.author: Kristen Shilton
articles.title: Boston Bruins expected to bring on Jim Montgomery as new head coach, sources say
articles.description: The Bruins are expected announce Jim Montgomery as their new coach Friday, the same day his contract as an assistant coach with the Blues expires.
articles.content:
The Boston Bruins are set to name Jim Montgomery as their new head coach, sources told ESPN on Thursday, confirming multiple reports.
The appointment is expected to be made official Friday, the same… [+2106 chars]

articles.title: NBA free agency 2022 - Breaking down the biggest signings, opt-ins and extensions of the summer
articles.description: How are the latest deals impacting the NBA landscape? Kevin Pelton is breaking down the biggest signings, opt-ins and contract extensions.
articles.content:
NBA free agency is here, and stars are making some big-money moves.

articles.title: Freddie Freeman agent Casey Close says Atlanta Braves perpetuating 'false narrative'
articles.description: Agent Casey Close says the Atlanta Braves are perpetuating a "false narrative" regarding the departure of first baseman Freddie Freeman from the organization and that he "will not stand by" as allegations about his role in negotiations.

articles.title: Portland Trail Blazers guard Anfernee Simons agrees to 4-year, $100 million deal, agent says
articles.description: Anfernee Simons averaged career-highs of 17.3 points and 29.5 minutes per game in 57 games -- including 30 starts -- for Portland this past season.
articles.content:
Portland Trail Blazers guard Anfernee Simons has agreed on a four-year, $100 million contract extension, his agent Bill Duffy of BDA Sports + WME Sports told ESPN's Adrian Wojnarowski.

articles.description: All-Star guard Bradley Beal has agreed to a five-year, $251 million maximum contract to stay with the Washington Wizards, his agent Mark Bartelstein of Priority Sports tells ESPN.

articles.description: Kevin Durant has requested a trade from Brooklyn, his business manager told ESPN, but the Nets are not buoyed to honoring any of KD's preferred destinations and plan to make a deal that allows them the greatest return of assets, sources told ESPN.

articles.title: USC, UCLA planning move from Pac-12 to Big Ten as early as 2024, sources say
articles.description: USC and UCLA are planning a move from the Pac-12 to the Big Ten conference as early as 2024, sources confirmed to ESPN.
articles.content:
USC and UCLA, two of the Pac-12's flagship programs, are planning to leave the conference for the Big Ten as early as 2024, and a move is considered imminent, sources confirmed to ESPN on Thursday.
